The Experience of Generations

In each bottle

Experience a true “American Dream” at Winehouse and visit the first tasting room in the States established by a former European mirgant vineyard worker and his family.

New Wines

Merlot

Winehouse Vineyard

Merlot is loved for its boisterous black cherry flavors, supple tannins, and chocolatey finish. On the high end, it’s often mistaken with Cabernet Sauvignon.
